MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW2 postcode area of Crewe, affecting properties in Walthall St, Nantwich Road and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of repairs required to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:52PM on 16th January 2021.
